story.title: Trust
story.content: Capricorn is hard to read and does not trust many people.

story.title: Satisfied
story.content: Capricorns' are never satisfied with whatever they achieve.

story.title: Feeds
story.content: Capricorn feeds off of body language a lot. It tells them more than words ever could.

story.title: Classy
story.content: Capricorn ladies are always classy, never trashy, but just a little nasty.

story.title: Strength
story.content: Responsible, Disciplined, Self-control, Good managers.

story.title: Weakness
story.content: Know-it-all, Unforgiving, Condescending, Expecting the worst.

story.title: Likes
story.content: Family, Tradition, Music, Understated status, Quality craftsmanship.

story.title: Dislikes
story.content: Almost everything at some point.

story.title: Mission
story.content: To lead by example. To act responsibly and with integrity to make the world a better place.

story.title: Time and Effort
story.content: To build something worthwhile takes time and effort, and you have plenty of both.

story.title: Undertake
story.content: You undertake tasks involving enormous effort because you understand that doing so will pay off in the long run.

story.title: Respect
story.content: As a child you respected your elders and you still do.

story.title: Friend
story.content: They want their friends to be honest and loyal people.

story.title: Limit
story.content: There are no limits when it comes to friends and family.

story.title: Tradition
story.content: Capricorn respects family traditions and loves spending holidays with friends and family.

story.title: Compatibility
story.content: Taurus, Virgo.

story.title: Difficult
story.content: When it comes to love and relationship - it's difficult to win over a Capricorn.

story.title: Serious
story.content: Capricorn is a serious lover, who likes to do things slowly and thoroughly.

story.title: Express
story.content: People born under the sign of Capricorn express their feelings, through actions more than through words.

story.title: Compatibility
story.content: Cancer

story.title: Free Spirit
story.content: There's a free-spirit inside you waiting to be released.

story.title: Learn
story.content: To think outside the square.

story.title: Reluctant
story.content: You can be reluctant to try new approaches, for the tried and tested methods take precedence.

story.title: Recognise
story.content: Recognise that others may have more knowledge than you.

story.title: People Like You
story.content: Muhammad Ali - Professional Boxer

story.title: People Like You
story.content: Stephen Hawking - Theoretical Physicist

story.title: People Like You
story.content: Isaac Newton - Physicist

story.title: People Like You
story.content: Dian Fossey - Zoologist
